name: Circuit Blade (Redwall10)
description:
March 30th, 2100  The planet needs your help cadet.  The brainy program is under attack by a computer virus. led by an evil terrorist organization called Black Pepper. inside the Star Light solar system. They came to learn about your new technology and take it for themselves. Now it is up to a nobody and his friends to join an unknown secret society to stop them.  Remember you are only human.                     

Inspired by phantasy star 2
